column5: Have you got your sights set on a career in finance or banking? If so this International Finance course at Swansea University is designed for graduates like you who want a specialised programme to accelerate them into to their exciting new career.This advanced programme in International Finance is for students who have already studied accounting, and/or finance, at undergraduate level. The Finance course takes a data driven approach to analysis of financial markets and organisational information. It combines academic theory of finance with a strong practical perspective using current trends and industry practice to inform teaching and discussion.
column7: Please visit our website for the International Finance course fee information.
